'''''Mallorn'' 5''' is the 5th issue of the [[Tolkien Society]]'s journal [[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]], published in 1972. It includes a [[Letter to Vera Chapman and the Tolkien Society|short letter from J.R.R. Tolkien]].

==Contents==
* '''Editorial'''
** Pro-Editorial from the Pro-Editor
*** By Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
*** Includes a [[Letter to Vera Chapman and the Tolkien Society|letter from Tolkien to Vera Chapman and The Tolkien Society]] (p.&nbsp;2).
** Letters to the Editors
*** By Bob Borsley, Will Haven, Roger Johnson, Tony Fallone, John Abbott, James Ead, Hal Broome, Catherine McEvoy, and Dave Weldrake
** Belladonna's Postbag
*** By Will Haven, John B. Abbott, and Belladonna Took (Vera Chapman)
* '''Notes'''
** Flaws in the Tapestry of ''The Lord of the Rings''
*** By John Abbott
** Shields of Middle-earth
*** By Helen Kerley
* '''Creative'''
** Serial: "Sir John de Creke, His Quest" (short story)
*** By Vera Chapman
** Tir Na Noge (poem)
*** By A.R. Fallone
** The Professor at Oxford (poem)
*** By Vera Chapman
** Nazgul (humorous vignettes)
*** By John B. Abbott
* '''Book Reviews'''
** ''[[Bored of the Rings (book)|Bored of the Rings]]'' by The Harvard Lampoon
*** Reviewed by Jonathan Brown
** ''The Last Unicorn'' by [[Peter S. Beagle]]
*** Reviewed by Belladonna Took (Vera Chapman)
** ''The Water of the Wondrous Isles'' by [[William Morris]]
*** Reviewed by Belladonna Took (Vera Chapman)
** ''Red Shadows'' by [[Robert E. Howard|R.E. Howard]]
*** Reviewed by Hal Broome
** ''The Whisper of Glocken'' by Carol Kendall
*** Reviewed by Rosie Turner
** ''A Wizard of Earthsea'' by [[Ursula K. Le Guin|Ursula Le Guin]]
*** Reviewed by Hartley Patterson
